content.query:
-- A: server & database
SELECT @@VERSION AS sql_server_version, DB_NAME() AS current_db;
GO

-- B: external data source exists
SELECT name, type_desc, location, credential_id
FROM sys.external_data_sources
WHERE name = 'bank_raw_data_adls';
GO

-- C: credential details
SELECT name, * FROM sys.database_scoped_credentials WHERE name = 'adls_sas_cred';
GO

-- D: session settings
SELECT SESSIONPROPERTY('ANSI_NULLS') AS ANSI_NULLS,
       SESSIONPROPERTY('QUOTED_IDENTIFIER') AS QUOTED_IDENTIFIER,
       @@SPID AS spid;
GO
